name: srp-devops
description: SRP运维插件 - 扩展allstaff功能，增加Kubernetes管理、监控告警、云资源管理等运维工具

srp:k8s.description: Kubernetes cluster management and monitoring (K8s集群管理)

srp:k8s-mgmt.description: Alias for Kubernetes management (K8s管理快捷命令)

srp:cloud.description: Cloud resources management for GCP (GCP云资源管理)

srp:gcp.description: Quick alias for GCP cloud resources (GCP快捷命令)
